Sinopse: The 41-Year-Old Virgin Who Knocked Up Sarah Marshall and Felt Superbad About It is a spoof of several of Judd Apatow's most famous comedy films, namely The 40-Year-Old Virgin, Knocked Up, Forgetting Sarah Marshall and Superbad. The story follows Andy (Bryan Callen), a 41-year old who desperately wants to lose his virginity as do his teenage roommates.—Anonymous
